Module mesakit.map.ui.desktop
Package com.telenav.mesakit.map.ui.desktop.graphics.canvas

Class MapCanvas

java.lang.Object
com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.geometry.DrawingCoordinateSystem
com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.surfaces.java2d.Java2dDrawingSurface
com.telenav.mesakit.map.ui.desktop.graphics.canvas.MapCanvas
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.naming.Named, com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.Coordinated, com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.CoordinateSystem, com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.DrawingSurface, MapProjection
public class MapCanvas extends com.telenav.kivakit.ui.desktop.graphics.drawing.surfaces.java2d.Java2dDrawingSurface implements MapProjection
A DrawingSurface with a mapArea() and a drawingSize() and a projection() that maps between the two:
  • toDrawing(Location)
  • MapProjection.toDrawing(Distance)
  • MapProjection.toDrawing(Rectangle)
  • MapProjection.toDrawing(Width)
  • MapProjection.toDrawing(Height)
  • toDrawing(Size)
  • toMap(DrawingPoint)
  • MapProjection.toMap(DrawingLength)
  • MapProjection.toMap(DrawingRectangle)
  • MapProjection.toMap(DrawingWidth)
  • MapProjection.toMap(DrawingHeight)
  • MapProjection.toMap(DrawingSize)

Graphic objects can be drawn using inherited methods for drawing in the DrawingCoordinateSystem for this canvas:

  • DrawingSurface.drawBox(Style, DrawingRectangle)
  • Java2dDrawingSurface.drawBox(Style, DrawingPoint, DrawingSize)
  • DrawingSurface.drawBox(Style, DrawingPoint, DrawingWidth, DrawingHeight)
  • Java2dDrawingSurface.drawDot(Style, DrawingPoint, DrawingLength)
  • Java2dDrawingSurface.drawLine(Style, DrawingPoint, DrawingPoint)
  • Java2dDrawingSurface.drawPath(Style, Path2D)
  • Java2dDrawingSurface.drawRoundedBox(Style, DrawingPoint, DrawingSize, DrawingLength, DrawingLength)
  • Java2dDrawingSurface.drawText(Style, DrawingPoint, String)

or in the coordinate system of a map, using a MapProjection onto the DrawingSurface:

  • drawBox(Style, Rectangle)
  • drawDot(Style, Location, Distance)
  • drawLabel(Style, Location, String)
  • drawPolyline(Style, Polyline)
  • drawSegment(Style, Segment)
  • drawText(Style, Location, String)
